CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Add to Cart stage positioned above or below the Visit Product Page stage?
SRP.A: The Add to Cart stage is positioned {below} the Visit Product Page stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initiate Checkout?
VE.A: The value of stage Initiate Checkout is {2361}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Visit Product Page?
VE.A: The value of stage Visit Product Page is {6232}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Enter Payment Information?
VE.A: The value of stage Enter Payment Information is {2360}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Visit Product Page, with a value of {6232}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Leave Product Review, with a value of {1246}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart?
SC.A: Decreased by {715} Users from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Visit Product Page to stage Add to Wishlist?
SC.A: Decreased by {1762} Users from stage Visit Product Page to stage Add to Wishlist.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 3058? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Visit Product Page} stage has {6232}, the {Add to Wishlist} stage has {4470}, the {Add to Cart} stage has {3755}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 2360? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Complete Purchase} stage has {1414}, the {Leave Product Review} stage has {1246}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2360 and 3058? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initiate Checkout} stage has {2361}, the {Enter Payment Information} stage has {2360}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase, or from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Cart} to {Initiate Checkout} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to {Add to Wishlist} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist, from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase, or from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to stage {Add to Wishlist} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Visit Product Page} and {Add to Wishlist} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initiate Checkout} and {Enter Payment Information} stages.
